General_Description: '''Untamed Seas''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Naval warfare intially proved difficult for soldiers and spies from landlocked [[Sparta]]. Enemy [[ship]]s, [[Piracy|pirates]], and [[Great white shark|sharks]] were all concerns.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
